title: Traits and Features
content: b Class) Wild Shape Feature As an action, you can assume the form of a beast. You may transform twice per Short Rest. All Druid Sub Classes Arctic Druid Spell Circle Gain Hold Person, which paralyzez a humanoid creature, and Spike Growth, which transforms the ground and deals 1d4 Piercing damage to creatures walking on the spikes. Circle of the Land Lvl 3 Coast Druid Spell Circle Gain Mirror Image, which improves your Armor Class, and Misty Step, which allows you to teleport a short distance. Ci
